backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs for currency updates, catalog changes, and UI controls.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file related to the calculator and UI styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles defining OKLCH color variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root component rendering the TotalAmountCalculatorPage.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines CatalogItem type and the predefined list of Indian food items with INR prices and categories.
Utilities for formatting numbers and currency using en‑IN and INR.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: UI for browsing, filtering, adding, deleting, and toggling out‑of‑stock catalog items with INR price display.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator page managing line items, catalog interactions, tax/discount inputs, and total breakdown.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: Type definitions for line items, calculator state, and calculation breakdown.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Helper functions for parsing numbers, clamping values, and computing subtotals, tax, discounts, and totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login/logout states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme colors from CSS variables, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and requirements for a calculator app with catalog and INR support.
